snippet: A report by the West Yorkshire police covered 68 of hundreds of sexual abuse allegations that have surfaced against the former television presenter Jimmy Savile.
abstract: Report by West Yorkshire police in Britain covers 68 of hundreds of sexual abuse allegations that have surfaced against former BBC television presenter Jimmy Savile.
lead_paragraph: A report by the West Yorkshire police covered 68 of hundreds of sexual abuse allegations that have surfaced against the former television presenter Jimmy Savile.

headline.seo: British Police Deny Protecting Jimmy Savile
headline.main: British Police Force Denies Protecting Savile From Abuse Allegations
headline.print_headline: Police in BBC Host’s Town Say They Did Not Shield Him
